description: Our initial submission is fed into the Mayor's budget consultation process

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["The Mayor's budget is published in March for the upcoming financial year. As one of the Greater London Authority (GLA) functional bodies, we provide an initial submission that is consolidated into the Mayor's consultation budget published in December."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
The final submission is then made in February and forms part of the formal budget published by the GLA.
Find out more about the Mayor's budget on the GLA website .
